DBMapItem.name: DefaultMulDB
DBMapItem.Value: SELECT CONTACT_WID , COUNT(CONTACT_WID) NO_OF_EMAIL_ASKS_PER_MONTH FROM W_CAMP_HIST_F A , W_SOURCE_D B WHERE A.SOURCE_WID = B.ROW_WID AND B.CAMP_ID != (SELECT LD.CAMP_ID FROM S_CAMP_LD_WAVE@VALUEOF(CRUK_DB_LINK) LD WHERE CASE WHEN LD.X_SRM_OBI_UPD_BY IS NULL THEN 'SADMIN' ELSE LD.X_SRM_OBI_UPD_BY END=UPPER('VALUEOF(USER)') AND EXEC_STATUS_CD in ('Loading','Update Count') AND LD.LAST_UPD=(SELECT MAX(A.LAST_UPD) FROM S_CAMP_LD_WAVE@VALUEOF(CRUK_DB_LINK) A WHERE CASE WHEN A.X_SRM_OBI_UPD_BY IS NULL THEN 'SADMIN' ELSE A.X_SRM_OBI_UPD_BY END= UPPER('VALUEOF(USER)'))) AND (( B.CAMP_START_DT BETWEEN (SELECT TRUNC(PROG_START_DT)-21 FROM S_SRC@VALUEOF(CRUK_DB_LINK) WHERE ROW_ID = (SELECT LD.CAMP_ID FROM S_CAMP_LD_WAVE@VALUEOF(CRUK_DB_LINK) LD WHERE CASE WHEN LD.X_SRM_OBI_UPD_BY IS NULL THEN 'SADMIN' ELSE LD.X_SRM_OBI_UPD_BY END=UPPER('VALUEOF(USER)') AND EXEC_STATUS_CD in ('Loading','Update Count') AND LD.LAST_UPD=(SELECT MAX(A.LAST_UPD) FROM S_CAMP_LD_WAVE@VALUEOF(CRUK_DB_LINK) A WHERE CASE WHEN A.X_SRM_OBI_UPD_BY IS NULL THEN 'SADMIN' ELSE A.X_SRM_OBI_UPD_BY END= UPPER('VALUEOF(USER)')))) AND (SELECT TRUNC(PROG_END_DT)+21 FROM S_SRC@VALUEOF(CRUK_DB_LINK) WHERE ROW_ID = (SELECT LD.CAMP_ID FROM S_CAMP_LD_WAVE@VALUEOF(CRUK_DB_LINK) LD WHERE CASE WHEN LD.X_SRM_OBI_UPD_BY IS NULL THEN 'SADMIN' ELSE LD.X_SRM_OBI_UPD_BY END=UPPER('VALUEOF(USER)') AND EXEC_STATUS_CD in ('Loading','Update Count') AND LD.LAST_UPD=(SELECT MAX(A.LAST_UPD) FROM S_CAMP_LD_WAVE@VALUEOF(CRUK_DB_LINK) A WHERE CASE WHEN A.X_SRM_OBI_UPD_BY IS NULL THEN 'SADMIN' ELSE A.X_SRM_OBI_UPD_BY END= UPPER('VALUEOF(USER)'))))) OR (B.CAMP_START_DT BETWEEN (SELECT PROG_START_DT FROM S_SRC@VALUEOF(CRUK_DB_LINK) WHERE ROW_ID = (SELECT LD.CAMP_ID FROM S_CAMP_LD_WAVE@VALUEOF(CRUK_DB_LINK) LD WHERE CASE WHEN LD.X_SRM_OBI_UPD_BY IS NULL THEN 'SADMIN' ELSE LD.X_SRM_OBI_UPD_BY END=UPPER('VALUEOF(USER)') AND EXEC_STATUS_CD in ('Loading','Update Count') AND LD.LAST_UPD=(SELECT MAX(A.LAST_UPD) FROM S_CAMP_LD_WAVE@VALUEOF(CRUK_DB_LINK) A WHERE CASE WHEN A.X_SRM_OBI_UPD_BY IS NULL THEN 'SADMIN' ELSE A.X_SRM_OBI_UPD_BY END= UPPER('VALUEOF(USER)')))) AND (SELECT TRUNC(PROG_END_DT)+21 FROM S_SRC@VALUEOF(CRUK_DB_LINK) WHERE ROW_ID = (SELECT LD.CAMP_ID FROM S_CAMP_LD_WAVE@VALUEOF(CRUK_DB_LINK) LD WHERE CASE WHEN LD.X_SRM_OBI_UPD_BY IS NULL THEN 'SADMIN' ELSE LD.X_SRM_OBI_UPD_BY END=UPPER('VALUEOF(USER)') AND EXEC_STATUS_CD in ('Loading','Update Count') AND LD.LAST_UPD=(SELECT MAX(A.LAST_UPD) FROM S_CAMP_LD_WAVE@VALUEOF(CRUK_DB_LINK) A WHERE CASE WHEN A.X_SRM_OBI_UPD_BY IS NULL THEN 'SADMIN' ELSE A.X_SRM_OBI_UPD_BY END= UPPER('VALUEOF(USER)')))) AND X_SRM_PRIORITY<= ( SELECT X_SRM_PRIORITY FROM S_SRC@VALUEOF(CRUK_DB_LINK) WHERE ROW_ID = (SELECT LD.CAMP_ID FROM S_CAMP_LD_WAVE@VALUEOF(CRUK_DB_LINK) LD WHERE CASE WHEN LD.X_SRM_OBI_UPD_BY IS NULL THEN 'SADMIN' ELSE LD.X_SRM_OBI_UPD_BY END=UPPER('VALUEOF(USER)') AND EXEC_STATUS_CD in ('Loading','Update Count') AND LD.LAST_UPD=(SELECT MAX(A.LAST_UPD) FROM S_CAMP_LD_WAVE@VALUEOF(CRUK_DB_LINK) A WHERE CASE WHEN A.X_SRM_OBI_UPD_BY IS NULL THEN 'SADMIN' ELSE A.X_SRM_OBI_UPD_BY END= UPPER('VALUEOF(USER)')))))) AND B.MEDIA_TYPE_CD = 'CR-UK Email' AND B.X_SRM_TYPE = 'Ask' AND B.CAMP_STATUS<>'Cancelled' AND B.X_SRM_TYPE NOT IN ('Follow Up','Macro Segment') AND (A.X_SRM_OUTCOME<>'Failed' OR A.X_SRM_OUTCOME IS NULL) GROUP BY CONTACT_WID
